Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • controller.Engine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Engine
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Defines the game engine.
    Author:
    Andrew Rickus, Todd Wickizer, Sean Gemberling
    See Also:

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main Main for the program. Creates a new engine, which causes the rest of the game to start.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments given for the program. Not used.
